channel.title: Run Client
channel.description:
[img]http://puu.sh/5esa4.png[/img]
[code]@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause[/code]
Help, thanks.

item.title: Run Client
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“Barrickz, post:1, topic:535449”]

@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

Help, thanks.[/quote]Replace:@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

with @echo off title Client cd ./locandclass/ "C:/Program files/Java/jre7/bin/java" -Xmx512m client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

Read full topic
